name: Aroma Java Client
tagline: The Official Java Client to the Aroma Service
body: Aroma Java Client ============================================== [](https://github.com/RedRoma/Aroma) [![Build Status](http://jenkins.sirwellington.tech/view/Aroma/job/Aroma%20Java%20Client/badge/icon)](http://jenkins.sirwellington.tech/view/Aroma/job/Aroma%20Java%20Client/) The Java Client to the Famed Aroma Service! The Aroma Service is Service Notifications for Developers. # Download To use, simply add the following maven dependency. >Not Released Yet ## Release ```xml tech.aroma 1.1 ``` ## Snapshot >First add the Snapshot Repository ```xml ossrh https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots ``` ```xml tech.aroma aroma-java-client 1.1-SNAPSHOT ``` # [Javadocs](http://www.javadoc.io/doc/tech.aroma/aroma-java-client/) # API
